text: Colin Jones (8 September 1940 - 25 October 2016) was an English footballer. He played in The Football League for Chester. A wing half, Jones was one of several youngsters to get his first-team chance with Chester in the closing stages of the 1959–60.Sumner (1997), p 72 But he only enjoyed three outings for the club before joining Wrexham,Sumner (1997), p 139 where he failed to make a league appearance. ==Bibliography== * ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Chester Category:English Football League players Category:Association football midfielders Category:English footballers Category:Chester City F.C. players Category:Wrexham A.F.C. players
title: Colin Jones (footballer, born 1940)
